[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/state_changer.c

State Changer Inheritable! You can use this to write a device which will change the states of things.

Written by Terano

Started 30/9/02

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /obj/vessel.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/effect.h and /include/tasks.h
